notably.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to say that a person or thing is a typical example or the most important example of something
notably.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Some early doctors, notably Hippocrates, thought that diet was important.
notably.translation[0].definitions[1].de: in a way that is clearly different, important, or unusual
notably.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Emigration has notably increased over the past five years.
Notably absent from his statement was any hint of an apology.
